io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.placeholder

Interface Placeholder.Standard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Placeholder, org.spongepowered.api.text.TextElement, org.spongepowered.api.text.TextRepresentable
    Enclosing interface:
    Placeholder

    public static interface Placeholder.Standard
extends Placeholder
    A placeholder that represents a plugin provided placeholder.

      • getAssociatedSource

        java.util.Optional<org.spongepowered.api.command.CommandSource> getAssociatedSource()
        If provided, the CommandSource which to pull information from when building the placeholder text.

        Examples of how this might affect a placeholder are:

        • For a "name" placeholder that prints out the source's name, the name would be selected from this source.
        • For a "balance" placeholder that returns a player's monetary balance, this would pull the balance from the player.

        It is important to note that the associated source does not necessarily have to be the sender/invoker of a message, nor does it have to be the recipient. The source is selected by the context of builder. It is up to plugins that use such placeholders to be aware of the context of which the placeholder is used.

        Returns:
        The associated CommandSource, if any.

      • argument

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> argument()
        The variable string passed to this token to provide contextual information.
        Returns:
        The argument, if any.
